sys_ui_macro.description: Renderer for Choice filter sections in Table Saw
sys_ui_macro.name: fil_choice_renderer
sys_ui_macro.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> <fieldset> <select ng-options="filter as filter.filterName for filter in filterSection.filters" ng-model="selectedFilter[filterSection.sectionID]" ng-change="adjustQuery(selectedFilter[filterSection.sectionID],filterSection.sectionID,filterSection.sectionType)" class="form-control select2" name="{{filterSection.sectionName}}"> <option value="">-- choose {{filterSection.sectionName.toLowerCase()}} --</option> </select> </fieldset> </j:jelly>
